summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 35th Avenue Northeast, from East 47th Street to East 50th Street; by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 99942 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
